column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////our waiter johnny made the entire experience.  he was delightfully charming
column3: and had fantastic food/sangria recommendations.  and it didnt appear to bother him at all that we were probably totally annoying (we ordered our food in several separate rounds
column4: and switched halfway from an outside table to indoors).  johnny elevated what would have been a nice dinner on its own into a fabulous dining experience.
